name: Chicken Stir-Fry
author: Rebecca Hooper

ingredients.name: lb. boneless, skinless chicken breasts, slightly frozen
Tbsp. sesame oil or vegetable oil
green pepper, cut into thin strips
red pepper, cut into thin strips

instructions: Combine garlic powder, onion powder, ginger, brown sugar, soy sauce, cornstarch, and water in a small bowl and set aside. Thinly slice chicken breasts. Preheat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium heat. Add green pepper, red pepper, and snow peas to wok or skillet. Cook until vegetables are crisp and tender, 3 minutes, stirring con- stantly. Push vegetables to the side of the wok or skillet. Add chicken and cook until chicken is lightly browned, 3 minutes, stirring constant- ly. Add water chestnuts and stir vegetables and chicken together. Stir in seasoning mixture. Bring to a boil and cook until mixture thickens slightly, 1 to 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Serve over hot rice.
